title: Can riot stop reworking champions into something worst?

replies.body:
Except none of them (Aatrox, Urgot, Yorick) were better and their reworks were completely justified in almost every way.

Had your examples been some of the more outrageous examples out of the class updates like Zac then it would've got some point. But at this stage, nope.
urgot was one thousand percent better pre-rework balance wise

you all forgot {{champion:82}}   sure his dmg is good. but really easy to kite. his kit is just not right
I didn't play Yorick or aatrox much before the reworks, but urgot feels much worse to play as now. Perhaps I still gotta get used to the changes since he is now completely different though.
